altTitles.ja: かわいい後輩に言わされたい

altTitles.en: I Want to be Teased by a Cute Junior

altTitles.zh-hk: 可愛後輩想讓我說出口

altTitles.pt-br: Eu quero ser provocado por uma kouhai fofa

description.en: Yasu likes his kouhai, Moriyama, who is at the same time extremely assertive, deadpan, and extremely passive aggressive.
description.ja: まったく素直じゃない後輩・守山ちゃんは、自分にアプローチさせようと野洲先輩を挑発したり、時には大胆にアクションしたり…!?
description.pt-br: Yasu gosta da sua kouhai, Moriyama, que é ao mesmo tempo extremamente assertiva, inexpressiva e extremamente passiva-agressiva.

altTitles.ja-ro: Tome wa Hane! Suzusato Koukou Shodoubu

altTitles.ja: とめはねっ!
とめはねっ! 鈴里高校書道部
とめはねっ！−鈴里高校書道部−

description.en:
Tales of a high-school calligraphy club.  
  
A story about a high-school calligraphy club on the verge of breaking up that enters in a major competition while overcoming problems. Yuki, a promising female judoist, and Yukari, a quiet Canadian-raised boy who just returned to Japan, end up joining the club for the sake of maintaining the membership required to keep the club. Together with the old club members with unique characters, they gradually discover the fun of calligraphy and work together to win in the competition.  
  
Tomehane! was nominated for best manga at the first two Manga Taisho.

Live action series adaptation (2010): [MyDramaList](https://mydramalist.com/742-tomehane)

title.en: Gakuen Idolm@ster - P ga P Shitemasu (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: PがPしてます (学園アイドルマスター)

description.en:
It's a story of cute idols and their Producer. Kotone-chan is cute!
A compilation of Gakumas doujin manga.

altTitles.ja: 大室家

description.en:
*A spin-off of the YuruYuri series featuring the Oomuro family of sisters!*

From oldest to youngest, there's **Nadeshiko**, the cool and serious high schooler; **Sakurako**, the silly, lazy, and (slightly) dimwitted middle schooler; and **Hanako**, the intelligent and mature elementary schooler! 

This story focuses on these three sisters, their friends. and the many fun and wild adventures they have together!
description.ja: 優秀な長女・撫子、残念な次女・櫻子、優秀な三女・花子からなる大室家３姉妹。自由奔放な櫻子を中心に今日も大室さん家は賑やかです♪

altTitles.ja: Homura-sensei wa Tabun Motenai
ほむら先生はたぶんモテない
Homura Sensei ha Tabun Motenai

altTitles.vi: Homura Sensei hình như không có số đào hoa

description.en:
High-school student Hasumi-chan is drawn to Homura-sensei, a young, socially awkward biology teacher generally seen as weak and boring but recognized by her to be kind.   


---
description.fr: Hasumi-chan, une lycéenne, est attirée par Homura-sensei, un jeune professeur de biologie socialement maladroit, généralement considéré comme faible et ennuyeux mais reconnu par elle comme étant gentil.
description.ru:
Молодой учитель биологии Хомура всегда ходит в белом халате и выглядит очень скучным и слабым, а так же имеет страх к нынешним школьницам, но Хасуми всегда пытается следовать за учителем, ведь тот добрый и симпатичный.  


---

title.en: GIRLS und PANZER - DARJEELING FIRST FLUSH (Doujinshi)

description.en: GIRLS und PANZER FAN BOOK DARJEELING FIRST FLUSH

altTitles.ja: 宝石の国

description.az: Cəvahiratlar ölkəsi (Houseki no Kuni), meteoritlərin altı dəfə Yerə düşdüyü və bu prosesdə onu məhv etdiyi uzaq gələcəkdə baş verir. Demək olar ki, bütün canlılar məhv oldu, qalan bütün torpaqlar tək bir sahilə çevrildi. Çox uzun zaman dilimləri ərzində həsas həyat forması olan yeni bir irq yarandı; insan şəklini alan ölməz zinət əşyaları. Fosfofillit (Phos) zəifdir (ən aşağı sərtliklərdən birinə malikdir) və həmyaşıdları tərəfindən yararsız hesab edilir. Phos'a təbiət tarixinin ensiklopediyasını yaratmaq tapşırığı verildikdən sonra o, uzaq, lakin müdrik həmkarı Kinovarın (Cinnabar) köməyinə müraciət edir, beləliklə onların dostluğu və şəxsi inkişafı başlayır. Eyni zamanda “Cəvahirat camaatı” onun dəbdəbəli dəyərindən yararlanmaq istəyən Aydan gələnlərlə (aylılarla) müharibə aparır.
description.en: In the distant future, a new life form called Houseki (gems) are born. The 28 Houseki must fight against the moon dwellers who want to attack them and turn them into decorations, thus each gem is assigned a role such as a fighter or a medic. Though they hope to fight the moon dwellers, Phos is a gem who is given no assignment until the gems' master Adamantine asks them to write an encyclopedia.
We just broke up but we live together? Coming Soon April 27th.

altTitles.ja: 伝説の男の娘もっこり配信者

A femboy shows off his bulge on a livestream!!

However, it gets even more popular than he expected?!

description.id: Seorang cowok cantik mencoba mengolok-olok penonton om-om dengan Steaming sambil cross-dressing dan memamerkan tubuh montoknya!! Namun, tidak disangka dia mendapatkan popularitas karena hal lain...!?
description.ja:
配信でもっこりを見せつける男の娘‼

しかし、それが以外にも人気が出てしまい…⁉

title.en: Juunenme, Kikan wo Akirameta Tenisha wa Imasara Shujinkou ni naru

altTitles.ja: 十年目、帰還を諦めた転移者はいまさら主人公になる

altTitles.en: On the Tenth Year, the Transferee Who Gave up Returning Finally Becomes the Protagonist

description.en:
Ten years after being transported to another world. 

It was more than enough time to awaken from what at first, felt like an exciting fantasy dream world. And on this 10th year Wasa Tooru gives up searching for a way to return to Japan, after being unsuccessful for so long. 

It was then that a job offer found its way to him — it was to be the bodyguard of twins who have knowledge of Earth.
description.ja: 突如、異世界へ転移したトールは、地球に帰還する手段を探し、ソロ冒険者として活動するが、九年間手掛かりを得る事が出来なかった…。十年目にしてこの世界で生きていく事を決意したトールだったが、ある依頼による“訳ありの双子”との出会いがトールの運命を大きく変える事になり!? ぼっち最強冒険者と頭脳明晰な双子とゆく、気ままな文明開化の異世界旅が始まる！

altTitles.ja: 救済系Vッタラー✟メシアちゃん

description.en: A horror manga where viewers watch and join in on Messiah-chan's stream activities.

altTitles.ja: 始末屋ソウジ
百瀬アキラの初恋破綻中。

altTitles.en: Momose Akira's First Love is Coming Apart.

altTitles.fr: Les difficultés du premier amour de Momose Akira.

altTitles.pt-br: O Primeiro Amor de Momose Akira em Ruínas

altTitles.ru: Первая любовь Акиры Момосе терпит крах.

altTitles.es: El primer amor de Momose Akira se derrumba.

altTitles.vi: Mối Tình Đầu Của Akira Momose Đang Trên Bờ Vực Đổ Vỡ
Mối tình đầu đầy trắc trở của Momose Akira

description.en: Kugayama Hajime, a boy living in the countryside, comes back to his old classmate Momose Akira, whom he used to admire. Just as he is about to watch her from afar and enjoy his sweet and sour youth, Akira makes an unexpected approach. And there was a "fate" that was more than he could have imagined.
description.es:
Kugayama Hajime, un chico que vive en el campo, se reencuentra con su antigua compañera de clase Momose Akira, a la que solía admirar.

Justo cuando está a punto de observarla desde lejos y disfrutar de su agridulce juventud, Akira se acerca de forma inesperada.

Y el "destino" es mucho más de lo que él pudo haberse imaginado.
description.fr: Kugayama Hajime, un garçon vivant à la campagne, revient vers son ancien camarade de classe Momose Akira, qu'il avait l'habitude d'admirer.Alors qu'il s'apprête à la regarder de loin et à profiter de sa jeunesse aigre-douce, Akira fait une approche inattendue.Et il y a eu un « destin » qui a été plus que ce qu'il aurait pu imaginer.
description.ja: ド田舎に暮らす少年・久我山はじめのもとに帰ってきた、かつての憧れの同級生・百瀬アキラ。彼女を遠くから眺めて、甘酸っぱい青春を謳歌しよう…と思っていた矢先に、アキラからまさかのアプローチが。そしてそこには、想像以上の”運命”が拡がってました。2人の様子を、どうぞあったかく見守ってください。
description.pl: Kugayama Hajime, chłopiec mieszkający na wsi, spotyka swoją dawną koleżankę z klasy, Momose Akiry, którą podziwiał. Gdy tylko zamierza obserwować ją z daleka i cieszyć się swoją słodko-gorzką młodością, Akira niespodziewanie zbliża się do niego. A za tym kryło się „przeznaczenie”, którego nie mógł sobie nawet wyobrazić.
description.ru: Жизнь Хадзимэ Кугаямы, мальчишки из глухой деревушки, круто меняется, когда в его жизнь возвращается бывшая одноклассница и когда-то недосягаемая мечта — Акира Момосэ. Он планировал просто наблюдать за ней издалека и наслаждаться воспоминаниями о своей юности... Но неожиданно Акира делает первый шаг навстречу. И вот тут начинается нечто гораздо большее, чем он мог себе представить. Следите за их историей и согревайте свои сердца вместе с ними.
description.tr: Taşrada yaşayan bir çocuk olan Kugayama Hajime’nin, eskiden hayranlık duyduğu sınıf arkadaşı Momose Akira geri döner. Tam onu uzaktan izleyip tatlı ekşi gençliğinin tadını çıkarmak üzereyken, Akira beklenmedik bir yaklaşımda bulunur. Ve hayal edebileceğinden de öte bir “kader” ile karşılaşır.
description.pt-br: Kugayama Hajime é um jovem que vive no interior. Sua vida muda quando Momose Akira, uma antiga colega de escola por quem ele sempre foi apaixonado, retorna à cidade. Hajime planejava admirá-la de longe, saboreando um romance juvenil agridoce. Mas, para sua surpresa, Akira toma a iniciativa de se aproximar. O que se desenrola a partir daí é um destino mais surpreendente do que ele jamais poderia ter imaginado.

altTitles.ja: シャイ

description.en: In the middle of the 21st century, the world was on the brink of World War III. But superheroes from across the globe appeared and helped bring an era of peace. With the crisis averted, the Heroes returned to their home countries where they now help with domestic matters. This is the story about the young Japanese heroine named "Shy"…
description.fr:
Au milieu du XXIe siècle, le monde était au bord de la troisième guerre mondiale. Mais des super-héros du monde entier sont apparus et ont contribué à l'avènement d'une ère de paix. La crise ayant été évitée, les Héros sont retournés dans leur pays d'origine où ils apportent désormais leur aide pour les affaires intérieures. C'est l'histoire de la jeune héroïne japonaise nommée « Shy »…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.id: Di pertengahan abad ke-21, dunia berada di ambang Perang Dunia ke III. Tapi pahlawan super dari seluruh dunia muncul dan membantu membawa era perdamaian. Bersamaan menghindari krisis, para Pahlawan kembali ke negara asal mereka di mana mereka sekarang membantu masalah-masalah dalam negerinya. Ini adalah kisah tentang pahlawan muda dari Jepang bernama "Shy"…
description.pt: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada "Shy"…
description.ru: В середине 21-го века мир был на гране третьей мировой войны. Но супер герои, появившиеся по всему миру, помогли принести в мир покой. Разобравшись с этим, герои вернулись в свои страны, где теперь помогают с местными проблемами. Эта же история о японской героини “Стесняшка”…
description.th: ในช่วงกลางศตวรรษที่ 21 โลกได้ตกอยู่ในยุคของสงครามโลกครั้งที่สาม แต่แล้วได้มีฮีโร่ปรากฏตัวขึ้นจากทั่วโลก และช่วยนำพายุคแห่งสันติภาพกลับคืนมา หลังจากวิกฤตได้ผ่านพ้นไป ฮีโร่แต่ละคนได้กลับไปยังประเทศบ้านเกิดของพวกเขา เพื่อช่วยเหลือภัยพิบัติที่เกิดขึ้นในของแต่ละประเทศของตัวเอง …นี่คือเรื่องราวเกี่ยวกับ สาวน้อยฮีโร่ชาวญี่ปุ่น ที่มีนามว่า "ฌาย"…
description.tr:
21. yüzyılın ortasında, dünya III. Dünya Savaşının eşiğindeydi. Süper kahramanlar dünyanın çeşitli yerlerinde ortaya çıktı ve barış çağını getirmeye yardımcı oldular. Kriz önlendiği için tüm kahramanlar kendi ülkelerine döndü ve iç meselelere yardım etmeye başladılar. Bu "SHY" adlı Japon Kadın Kahramanının hikayesi…?  


---

 Author's Twitter: [@bukimi397](https://twitter.com/bukimi397)
description.vi:
Vào giữa thế kỷ 21, trong số các anh hùng có mặt khắp nơi trên khắp thế giới xuất hiện một anh hùng siêu xấu hổ đến từ Nhật Bản với biệt danh là "Shy".
Cô gánh trên mình trách nhiệm của một anh hùng, mặc dù bản thân rất kém trong việc đối mặt với ánh mắt đến từ mọi người.
Dù gặp biết bao gian khó và khổ đau, nhưng Shy vẫn đứng lên vì những người xung quanh...! 
Không chỉ dừng ở những cuộc xung đột, SHY còn là câu chuyện về tình người, về sự đồng tâm hiệp lực của các anh hùng để cùng nhau tiến về phía trước!
Câu chuyện trưởng thành về anh hùng mang tấm lòng nhân ái!
description.es-la: A mediados del siglo 21, el mundo estaba al borde de la 3ra Guerra Mundial. Sin embargo, alrededor del mundo, héroes comenzaron a aparecer y ayudaron a traer la paz a esta era. Con esa crisis habiendo sido evitada, los héroes regresaron a sus paises de origen donde ahora ayudan con asuntos internos. Esta historia se trata de la joven heroína japonesa llamada "Shy"…
description.pt-br: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada “Shy”...

title.en: Tou no Kanri o Shite Miyou

altTitles.ja: 塔の管理をしてみよう

altTitles.ja-ro: Tou no Kanri wo Shite Miyou

altTitles.ru: Получается, я теперь в ответе за башню

altTitles.vi: Isekai làm người quản lý tháp

description.en: Kosuke is killed by a truck, his soul is lost in a garden with two beautiful girls. The owner of the place will let him choose whether he will be reborn or summoned to another world, and he maintains the summons. In this new world, the main two girls who were created by the owner of the garden to help him find the mystery behind the world - a Dungeon tower. Will he be able to become the owner of this tower and manage it?
description.ja: 仕事帰りに交通事故に遭ったことから魂が別世界に飛ばされてしまった考助。彼は保護してくれた女神の助力により、これまでの記憶を持ったまま新しい世界で生きていくことに。さらに女神が創造してくれたという、チートな能力と天使のような羽を持つ最強美女ふたりをお供に、新たな生を送ることになったのですが――。
description.es-la: Kosuke es atropellado por un camión mientras regresaba del trabajo. En ese momento, mientras su vida terminaba, su alma fue transferida al "Jardín de la eterna primavera" donde lo esperaba una hermosa mujer. Ella inmediatamente lo lleva con la diosa suprema, encargada de dicho mundo. La diosa suprema le permitirá elegir entre poder entrar al ciclo de la encarnación y renacer para empezar una nueva vida o ser invocado a otro mundo, de lo cual él elige ser invocado. La diosa suprema antes de transferirlo a este nuevo mundo le otorga una habilidad divina y dos bellas y poderosas sirvientes. En este nuevo mundo, las dos chicas principales que fueron creadas por la diosa del jardín le ayudarán a encontrar el misterio detrás del mundo: una torre de mazmorra. ¿Podrá convertirse en el dueño de esta torre y administrarla?

altTitles.ja: 残り火の騎士

altTitles.th: เพลิงแค้นของอัศวิน

description.en:
When Nagyunn’s twin brother, Najin, is murdered before his very eyes, he vows to avenge his brother’s death by assuming Najin’s identity. 

But although the two may look alike, when it comes to fighting, Nagyunn lacks the talent and skill his brother possessed. In order to successfully execute his plot for revenge, Nagyunn resolves to train himself to become the prodigious knight-in-training his brother once was. 

Will Nagyunn be able to keep his identity a secret before others begin to catch on to his act?

description.ko:
유일한 가족이자, 최고의 기사 유망주였던 쌍둥이 동생이 살해당했다.
천재적이었던 동생과는 달리 무예에 재능이 전혀 없지만,
동생의 복수를 위해 '강함'을 연기하기로 결심했다.
약해빠진 나는 복수에 성공할 수 있을까.

description.ru:
Мой брат-близнец, единственный член семьи, восходящая звезда и главный кандидат на становление рыцарем, был убит. В отличие от него, у меня совсем не было таланта к боевым искусствам. Однако ради того, чтобы отомстить за своего брата, я должен стать сильнее.

น้องชายฝาแฝดของฉันเป็นผู้เข้าสอบอัศวินที่เก่งที่สุดในประเทศถูกลอบสังหาร ฉันซึ่งไม่มีความสามารถในการต่อสู้เลยนั้น ตัดสินใจแล้วว่าจะแกล้งปลอมตัวเป็นน้องชายที่แข็งแกร่งของฉันเพื่อแก้แค้นแทนเขา ตัวฉันที่อ่อนแอจะสามารถแก้แค้นคนที่ฆ่าน้องชายของฉันได้หรือไม่

description.zh:
弟弟是最强骑士却被杀害？
软弱的我为复仇假扮弟弟！
某天，洛辰洛谦两兄弟家里来了一伙神秘人，他们企图杀害弟弟洛辰。洛辰是整个大陆最有实力的预备骑士，而洛谦却是一个手无缚鸡之力的少年。危机时刻洛辰为了保护哥哥丧命于家中。哥哥洛谦为了查明真相，找出真凶，于是假扮成弟弟成为了一名骑士。但哥哥洛谦并没有骑士资质，他只能依靠伪装骗过众人，同时寻找神秘人为弟弟报仇。软弱的洛谦可以成功找到真相为弟弟复仇吗？

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SC46p8Zh2g4)
---
- [Official English <Tappytoon> Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-ember-knight)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/yuhuoqishi/list?title_no=1651)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001459)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/the-ember-knight/list?title_no=3062)

altTitles.ja: 継母の心得

description.en:
Yamazaki Misaki passed away due to illness, but when she awoke, she found that she had been reborn as a character in a manga she had read before her death — the abusive, wicked stepmother of the young protagonist.  

Only remembering this the day before her wedding, there was already no way to escape. Determined to treat her stepson well, upon meeting him, she found the boy extremely adorable! 

As she worked to raise the child well with her memories to aid her, the attitude of her cold husband began to change?!
description.ja: 病気でこの世を去ることになった山崎美咲。ところが目を覚ますと、生前読んでいたマンガの世界に転生していた。しかも、幼少期の主人公を虐待する悪辣な継母キャラとして……。前世の記憶を取り戻したのは結婚式の前日で、もはや逃げようもない。とにかく虐待しないようにしよう、と決意して対面した継子は――めちゃくちゃ可愛いんですけどー!!!　ついつい前世の知識を駆使して子育てに奮闘しているうちに、超絶冷たかった旦那様の態度も変わってきて……!?　義息子のためならチートにもなっちゃう！　愛とオタクの力で異世界の育児事情を変える、異色の子育てファンタジー、開幕！

altTitles.ja: 義妹生活

description.en:
From classmates to brother and sister, living under the same roof.

After his father’s remarriage, Asamura Yuuta ends up getting a new stepsister, coincidentally the number one beauty of the school year, Ayase Saki. Having learned important values when it comes to man-woman relationships through the previous ones of their parents, they promise each other not to be too close, not to be too opposing, and to merely keep a vague and comfortable distance.

On one hand, Saki, who has worked in solitude for the sake of her family, doesn’t know how to properly rely on others, whereas Yuta is unsure of how to really treat her. Standing on fairly equal ground, these two slowly learn the comfortable sensation of living together.

Their relationship slowly evolves from being strangers the more the days pass. Eventually, this could end up in a story about love for all we know.
description.pt-br:
De colegas de classe a irmão e irmã, vivendo sob o mesmo teto.

Após o novo casamento de seu pai, Asamura Yuuta acaba ganhando uma nova meia-irmã, coincidentemente a beleza número um do ano escolar, Ayase Saki. Tendo aprendido valores importantes no que diz respeito aos relacionamentos homem-mulher através dos anteriores de seus pais, eles prometem um ao outro não ser muito próximos, não ser muito opostos e apenas manter uma distância vaga e confortável.

Por um lado, Saki, que trabalhou sozinha pelo bem de sua família, não sabe como confiar adequadamente nos outros, enquanto Yuta não tem certeza de como realmente tratá-la. Estando em terreno bastante igual, os dois aprendem lentamente a sensação confortável de viver juntos.

O relacionamento deles evolui lentamente de estranhos à medida que os dias passam. Eventualmente, isso pode acabar em uma história sobre o amor, pelo que sabemos.

altTitles.ja: 迷い猫オーバーラン!

description.en: The story revolves around Takumi Tsuzuki, a boy who lives with his older "sister" Otome, although the two have no blood ties between them. Otome manages a run-down confectionery store called Stray Cats. One day, Otome picks up a mysterious beautiful girl off the streets.
description.pt-br: A história gira em torno de Tsuzuki Takumi, um garoto que vive com sua "irmã" mais velha, Otome, embora os dois não tenham laços de sangue entre eles. Otome administra uma confeitaria decadente chamada Stray Cats. Um dia, Otome pega uma linda garota misteriosa nas ruas.

altTitles.ja: てんぷる

description.en: That's right, I'll become a monk! Not knowing what to do with his worldly desires, Akagami Akemitsu aims to live a stoic life. However, the thick karmic blood flowing in him will not permit it!
description.es: Así es, me volveré un monje! Al no saber qué hacer con sus deseos mundanos, Akagami Akemitsu aspira a llevar una vida estoica. Sin embargo, la espesa corriente de energía del karma que fluye en él no lo permitirá.
description.es-la: "É isso mesmo, eu vou me tornar um monge!". Sem saber o que fazer com seus desejos mundanos, Akagami Akemitsu decide viver uma vida estóica. No entanto, o sangue cármico espesso que flui nele não permitirá!

description.en: Yuusuke, an average office worker meets with his friend at a reunion, only to find out that the fashion world has left him behind. Now, with the help of his sister Tamaki, Yuusuke must take his step into the world of trends and charisma.
description.pt-br: Yuusuke, um trabalhador de escritório comum encontra-se com seu amigo em uma reunião, apenas para descobrir que o mundo da moda o deixou para trás. Agora, com a ajuda de sua irmã Tamaki, Yuusuke deve entrar no mundo das tendências e do carisma

I'm always at the mercy of the prince!?
A slapstick romantic comedy with a handsome girl!
description.pt-br:
Estou sempre à mercê do príncipe!?
Uma comédia romântica pastelão com uma garota linda!

description.en:
A lighthearted adventure series based off then-current Sonic games, changing focus nearly every year. Games covered in story arcs include:  
  
- Sonic Unleashed  
- Sonic & The Black Knight  
- Sonic Chronicles  
- Sonic Colors  
- Sonic Generations

title.en: Tensei Shitara Sainou ga Atta Ken ~Isekai Itte mo Doryoku Suru~

altTitles.ja: 転生したら才能があった件～異世界行っても努力する～

altTitles.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated With Talent: I'll Work Hard Even If I Go to Another World

description.en:
In a twist of fate, a diligent ronin student finds himself transported to an unfamiliar realm. This unexpected journey began when he valiantly attempted to stop a robbery alongside a female store clerk. Longing for a unique ability that he could hone through hard work, he sought the blessings of a deity. Consequently, he was endowed with two rare talents: "Innate Talent," allowing him to consistently surpass others, and "Clairvoyance," which grants him the insight to assess both individuals and objects. Yet, there's a catch; he requires thrice the standard experience to ascend in levels.

Reborn as Mars, the second son of a noble viscount lineage, he remains committed to refining his abilities. However, the town's periphery shows alarming indications of an imminent monster incursion. Thus, Mars' extraordinary journey of reincarnation in this fantastical world commences.
description.ja: いくら努力しても報われない浪人生は、コンビニの女性店員とともに強盗を捕縛しようとした瞬間、異世界に転生することになってしまった。神様に“努力をしたらしただけ恵まれる才能”を望むんだところ、レベルアップに人より3倍の経験値が必要だが、確実に人より成長できる【天賦】と他者や物を鑑定できる【天眼】のスキルをもらうことになった。準男爵家の次男・マルスとして転生し、努力を重ねてステータスを伸ばしていたが、街の近くで魔物が溢れるスタンピードの前兆が見られて……。異世界転生努力ファンタジー、ここに開幕！

altTitles.ja: 今朝も揺られてます

altTitles.en: They are Still Being Shaken This Morning

description.en: This is your typical story of a boy who's secretly in love with a girl, they both share a 20 minute ride on the commuter train on their way to different schools, will the boy be able to approach the girl and confess his love? And also... What he doesn't know: There's 3 other passengers that secretly support the boy's secret love towards the girl! Read now the hijinks that ensue when the boy tries to approach the girl; from the creator of *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* and *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.
description.ja: 午前6時58分舞原行きの通学電車。名前も知らないあの子と僕…とその乗客!? 高校生の男女2人が醸し出す甘酸っぱい雰囲気に、乗客たちが心情駄々洩れで盛り上がる!!
description.pt-br: Esta é a típica história de um garoto que está secretamente apaixonado por uma garota. Ambos compartilham uma viagem de 20 minutos no trem do subúrbio a caminho de escolas diferentes. O garoto será capaz de se aproximar da garota e confessar seu amor? E, além disso... O que ele não sabe: há três outros passageiros que secretamente apoiam o amor secreto do garoto pela garota! Leia agora as confusões que acontecem quando o garoto tenta se aproximar da garota; do criador de *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* e *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.

title.en: My Son, Quickly Rely On Your Father's Prestige

My Son Quickly Rely On Your Father's Prestige

altTitles.ja: 親心チートが無敵すぎる件

description.en: Qin Chuan transmigrated into a mysterious fantasy world. Not only did he gain a son, Qin Zi, for free, but also a cheatcode—a system that made him stronger every time his son caused trouble. After discovering that Qin Zi was a weakling with immense plot armor, Qin Chuan started on an endless journey to troll his son…

title.en: The Demon King's Daughter Is Way Too Easy

altTitles.ja: 魔王の娘、すごくチョロい。

altTitles.vi: Con gái của quỷ vương dễ đối phó thật đấy

description.en: In the final showdown between the Demon King and the Hero, the latter used all his power to seal away the former. To exact her revenge on her father's nemesis, the Demon King's daughter, Hel, resurrected the Hero and planned to use him as her personal servant. However, the resurrected Hero is unexpectedly dazzling and dashing, and Hel's composure begins to waver. Will she ever be able to torment her new servant?
description.ja: かつて魔王と勇者は対決し、魔王は封印され勇者は力尽きた…。魔王の娘であるヘルは父の仇である勇者への恨みを晴らすべく、彼を蘇らせ、そして下僕としてこき使ってやろうと考えていた。だが、蘇ってきた勇者は何だかやたらとキラキラしていてカッコ良くて、ヘルの調子は狂いっぱなし。果たして勇者を下僕として苦しめることは出来るのか…!?

altTitles.ja: 洒落にならないネット掲示板百物語～都市伝説コミック怪談集～

altTitles.ja-ro: Share ni Naranai Net Keijiban Hyaku Monogatari: Toshi Densetsu Comic Kaidanshuu

altTitles.en: Chilling Internet Urban Legends: A Horror Comic Anthology

altTitles.ja-ro: Hontou ni Kowai Net Keijiban Hyaku Monogatari: Toshi Densetsu Comic Kaidanshuu

altTitles.ja: 本当に怖いネット掲示板百物語～都市伝説コミック怪談集～

description.en: Featuring eerie urban legends that became popular on the internet, faithfully adapted into comics by skilled authors. A true horror anthology for urban legends!

"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

title.en: It's Over! Empress' Husband Is Actually Invincible

altTitles.zh: 完了啊！女帝的软饭丈夫居然无敌

altTitles.zh-ro: Wanliao Ah! Nvdi De Ruan Fan Zhangfu Juran Wudi

description.en: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

altTitles.ja: ハーフサキュバスを拾った

description.en: Take a child half succubus and half human.
description.id: Mungut anak setengah succubus dan setengah Manusia

altTitles.ja: メダリスト

description.en:
There is a dream worth putting two lives on the line for.  
  
Tsukasa, a young man with shattered dreams, and Inori, a girl no one believed in. However, in the face of adversity, those two possessed a tenacity towards the rink greater than anyone had ever known. Together, they meet on the ice, and aim for the world with their figure skating!

---

**Links:**  
- [Series' Twitter](https://twitter.com/medalist_AFT)
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA (U.S. Only)](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10231/episode/318207), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/medalist/)
description.es:
Tsukasa es un patinador que, tras haber dejado atrás su sueño de convertirse en un atleta de élite por problemas económicos, trabaja realizando espectáculos de patinaje sobre hielo.

Pero todo cambia cuando conoce a Inori, una niña que acude a una pista de hielo a escondidas de su madre, aunque esta esté totalmente en contra de ello y todo el mundo piense que es tarde para ella, y que es demasiado inútil.

Así, gracias a la tenacidad que muestra Inori, Tsukasa decide convertirse en su entrenador y buscará ayudarla en el difícil mundo del patinaje artístico, prometiéndose que la llevará a la cima.
description.zh: 用利刃融化坚冰、开拓人生——！

title.en: Yume no Shizuku, Kin no Torikago

altTitles.ja: 夢の雫、黄金の鳥籠

altTitles.en: Drops of Dreams, the Golden Birdcage

altTitles.vi: Tàn dư mộng ước, Lồng chim hoàng kim

description.en:
Beginning of 16th century – Alexandra was captured by slave traders from Ukraine during one of their many raids. 
When the traders arrived in Greece to sell the female slaves, a young handsome man named Mateus bought her 
and promised to give her true freedom. 
He hired countless teachers, scholars, and palace ladies to train her into the most perfect woman of her time. 
Mateus's kindness has caused Alexandra to deeply fall in love with him, and she secretly wishes to be his concubine. 
But Mateus has already promised her to his best friend… Suleiman the Great, Emperor of the Ottoman Empire! 
What does freedom mean when you are in another man’s harem and can only look at the one you love from afar? 
Not willing to endure agony, Alexandra promises herself that one day she will free both of them from their bird cages… 
but Mateus is the Grand Vizier, power only second to the Emperor himself. 
So Alexandra must become the most influential concubine in order to have any hope which also means, bearing Suleiman’s son. 
However, Suleiman already has a son by another concubine, and this woman is determined to keep her son as the only prince.  
  
Hence begins the story of a slave to an empress of the greatest empire of all time – 
Alexandra, the woman who would one day be known as Roxelana, Empress of the Ottoman Empire.
description.vi: Tác phẩm “Yume no Shizuku, Kin no Torikago" kể về câu chuyện của Alexandra, một cô gái trẻ sống tại Ruthenia bị bắt cóc bởi quân Tatar và được bán làm nô lệ cho Đế quốc Ottoman. Alexandra sau đó được đưa vào hậu cung của Sultan Suleiman I và đổi tên thành Hurrem. Hurrem trở thành một trong những phi tần được sủng ái nhất của Sultan Suleiman I và sau đó trở thành Haseki Sultan, một trong những nhân vật quyền lực nhất trong hậu cung.

altTitles.ja: 霧尾ファンクラブ

description.en: Aimi Miyoshi and Nami Sometani are two high school girls who often find themselves talking about a boy in their class, Kirio. This lighthearted romantic comedy follows the daily lives of these two friends and rivals on a journey that, for now, seems to be heading everywhere but love.
description.ja:
女子高生・三好藍美（みよしあいみ）と染谷波（そめたになみ）。二人の間で話題にのぼるのは、いつだって同じクラスの「霧尾（きりお）くん」のこと。
友人でありライバルでもある二人の日常を描く、ラブまではまだたどり着けそうにない一方通行ラブコメディー。

altTitles.ja: 爆音🗲列島
爆音列島

description.en: In the 80s, Kaze Takashi's parents moved to a quiet area in Tokyo to protect their son from the bad influence of his friends. In class, Takashi doesn't wait to make new friends. Passionate for motorcycle rallies, they invite Takashi to join the next event. It became a revelation for the young man and he decides to join a biker gang! Now all that's left is to find a motorbike…

title.en: Wazawai no Avalon ~Game Saijaku no Akuyaku Debu ni Ten'i Shita kedo, Ore dake "Yasereba Tsuyokute New Game" na Sekai datta no de, Saisoku Level Up & Hametsu Flag Kaihi de Kage no Eiyuu o Mezashimasu~

altTitles.ja: 災悪のアヴァロン～ゲーム最弱の悪役デブに転移したけど、俺だけ“やせれば強くてニューゲーム”な世界だったので、最速レベルアップ＆破滅フラグ回避で影の英雄を目指します～

altTitles.en: Finding Avalon: The Quest of a Chaosbringer

description.en:
The main character loves the MMORPG game called Dungeon Explorer Chronicle (Dun-Ex). During one particular day, a beta test event was announced, and he managed to beat it.
In exchange for clearing the event, he was granted permission to try the beta test server. Forcing to choose different avatar and skill as the system doesn't allow his own, he eventually settled on random. However, he is transferred to a place where, as expected, he finds a fat, villainous mob character...!
description.ja: 廃人ゲーマーの会社員“俺”は、やり込んだVRMMO「ダンエク」の世界に転移した。しかし転移先は悪役のデブキャラで!?

altTitles.ja: いなりの結婚
獣王と薬草

description.en: Dungeons are the stuff of dreams—defeat the monsters, take their loot, and then venture into uncharted territory to discover hidden riches! Tina, an upstart adventurer with just such a dream, ends up mortally wounded while exploring a dungeon. Suddenly, the great demon known as the Beast King Garon, who was supposed to have been slain by a hero in the distant past, appears before her!  Dungeon fantasy meets medical drama!
description.ru:
Подземелья - это воплощение мечты…
Собирайте материалы с поверженных монстров,
добирайтесь до неисследованных мест и завладевайте сокровищами!
Тина, авантюристка, мечтает о таком успехе,
Исследуя подземелье, она получает тяжелое ранение.
Перед ней появляется сильнейший демон «Король зверей Гарон», когда-то в прошлом он должен был быть убит героем?..

Фэнтези и медицинская драма по мотивам подземелья от Konda Tatsukazu, автора оригинальной истории «Ginrou Bloodborne/Серебряный волк, рожденный в крови», начинается!

title.en: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You

altTitles.ja: 君のことが大大大大大好きな100人の彼女

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi no Koto ga Daidaidaidaidaisuki na 100-nin no Kanojo
Kimi no Koto ga Dai Dai Dai Dai Daisuki na 100-nin no Kanojo

altTitles.pt-br: As 100 Namoradas que te Amam Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Mesmo.

altTitles.ru: 100 девушек, которые очень-очень-очень-очень-очень сильно тебя любят

altTitles.es-la: Las 100 Novias Que Te Quieren Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho
Mis 100 novias que me quieren mucho mucho

altTitles.vi: 100 Cô Bạn Gái Này Rất, Rất, Rất, Rất, Rất Là Yêu Tôi Đó

altTitles.zh-hk: 超超超超超喜歡你的100個女友

altTitles.it: Le 100 fidanzate che ti amano tanto tanto tanto tanto tanto

description.en: Aijo Rentaro has asked a hundred girls out and struck out every time. In desperation, he prays for guidance, only to be told by a god that his rejections were due to a cosmic mishap! Now this god will set things right by making sure Aijo gets one hundred dates. Except, as things often go with gods, there’s a catch: each of his one hundred dates is Aijo’s destined soulmate! Worse, if he doesn’t return their feelings, they’ll all die in horrible - and hilarious - accidents!
description.ja: 「好き」っていいたい！いわれたい！中学卒業式に100回目の失恋をした愛城恋太郎は、高校でこそ初めての彼女を！と願う。そんな彼の前に現れた恋の神様が告げた未来は「高校生活で出会う“運命の人”は100人。しかし彼女達は、幸せになれなければなんやかんや（中略）あって…死ぬ」　突然始まるDEAD OR LOVEな純愛ハーレムライフ!!　絶対に脱落しない・させない！
description.ru: Что может быть хуже отказа на признание в любви? Сотня отказов на признание в любви! Айдзё Рэнтаро – безнадёжный романтик, признавшийся в любви уже сто раз, но по необъяснимым причинам каждый раз получавший отказ. В один прекрасный день перед ним предстаёт сам Бог Любви и говорит, что его ужасная удача в любви обернулась вспять! Теперь Айдзё предстоит встретить 100 девушек "Соулмейтов" – каждая из них предназначена ему самой судьбой и без памяти влюблена в него! Но вот беда: ни у одного человека не должно быть столько соулмейтов. Если он не ответит хоть одной из них взаимностью, девушку ждёт смерть от несчастного случая! Теперь это дело любви и смерти, а выбор за Айдзё.
description.pt-br: Aijou é um garoto que tem muito azar no amor e já foi rejeitado mais de 100 vezes. Desesperado ele vai num templo pedir ajuda aos deuses. E seu desejo foi atendido, para cada rejeição ele terá uma alma gêmea. Mas isso se tona uma maldição quando ele fica sabendo que se elas não forem felizes ao lado de sua alma gêmea, ele, elas vão morrer… Mas que merda, você ainda está lendo isso? Não escutou? São 100 garotas, 100! Não há tempo a perder!

title.en: I Don't Feel Like Doing Anything

altTitles.en: I Don't Want To Do Anything

description.en:
One spring day, after the recent death of her mother, Summer decides to quit her stressful city job. She moves to a small beachside town, where she plans to use her entire life savings on two years of doing absolutely nothing. She calculates that she can subsist for this long without finding a job by leading a minimalist, free life. She finds peace and makes friends in her new environment But after a while, the walls of her home are repeatedly vandalized with death threats. Will Summer be able to catch the villain, find normalcy in her life, and make peace with herself?

---

description.ko:
26살의 봄, 오늘부터 아무것도 하지 않기로 결심했다

엄마가 그랬다. 
손해 보고 사는 게 편하다고.

엄마 말이 맞다.
그래, 손해 보고 살자.

단, 호구 잡히지 않을 정도만.

이여름, 26세 봄
오늘 회사를 그만뒀다.

---

title.en: 100 Ghost Stories That Will Lead to My Own Death

altTitles.ja: 僕が死ぬだけの百物語
Boku ga Shinu dake no Hyakumonogatari

altTitles.en: The Hundred Ghost Stories That Led to My Death
Hundred Ghost Stories of My Own Death
100 Ghost Stories That Will Lead to My Own Death

description.en:
One day, an elementary school child named Yuuma tries to jump out of his classroom window. His classmate Hina stops him and, in a bid to stall for time, asks him, “Do you know the round of a hundred ghost stories?” Hina tells Yuuma about a ritual where, if you tell a hundred ghost stories, you’ll see ghosts afterward. Learning this gives Yuuma a new lease on life. Chapter by chapter, he shares ghost stories with the reader, slowly but surely inching his way toward one hundred…

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
description.pt-br: Série de terror antológica detalhando a "Rodada das 100 Histórias de Fantasmas", muitas vezes usado como um teste de coragem, onde os participantes contam cem histórias sobrenaturais,  apagam uma vela e se olham no espelho depois de terminar cada história. Quando a centésima vela é apagada, diz-se que fantasmas e demônios são convocados ao nosso mundo. Um antigo conto popular originário do Japão recontado por de Yuuma, um menino que vive em uma casa problemática.

title.en: I Shaved. Then I Brought a High School Girl Home.

altTitles.es-la: Me afeité la barba. Y luego recogí a una colegiala.

altTitles.ru: Я побрился. Затем привёл старшеклассницу домой.

altTitles.ja: ひげを剃る。そして女子高生を拾う。

altTitles.en: Higehiro: After Being Rejected, I Shaved and Took in a High School Runaway

altTitles.ja-ro: Hige wo Soru. Soshite Joshi Kousei wo Hirou.
Hige Wo Soru. Soshite Joshikosei Wo Hirou.

altTitles.ar: حلقت فجلبت فتاة مدرسة ثانوية إلى المنزل

altTitles.th: โกนหนวดไปทำงาน แล้วกลับบ้านมาพบเธอ

altTitles.zh: 剃须，然后捡到女高中生

altTitles.zh-ro: Tì xū, ránhòu jiǎn dào nǚ gāozhōng shēng

altTitles.ja: ひげひろ

description.en: Yoshida was swiftly rejected by his crush of 5 years. On his way home after drinking his sorrows away, he saw a high school girl sitting on the street. "I'll let you do it with me, so let me stay". "Don't even joke about something like that". And so, the story of living with the high school girl Sayu began. The slice-of-life romance story between a runaway high school girl and a 26 year old salaryman ensues.
description.es: Yoshida fue rápidamente rechazado por su amor de 5 años. En su camino a casa después de consumir sus penas, vio a una chica de secundaria sentada en la calle. "Te dejaré hacerlo conmigo, así que déjame quedarme". "No bromees con algo así". Y así comenzó la historia sobre la convivencia con la chica de secundaria, Sayu. La romántica historia de la vida entre una colegiala fugitiva y un asalariado de 26 años comienza.
description.fr: Après l’avoir aimée pendant cinq ans, Yoshida est rejeté par sa supérieure. En rentrant chez lui après avoir bu pour oublier sa tristesse, il tombe sur une lycéenne assise par terre. « Je te laisserai le faire avec moi, si tu me laisses rester chez toi. » « Ne dis pas des choses comme ça, même pour plaisanter. » C’est ainsi que commence l’histoire de Sayu la lycéenne fugueuse avec Yoshida, un employé banal de 26 ans.
description.ru: Йошиду поспешно отвергла девушка, в которую он был влюблён 5 лет. Утопив своё горе в алкоголе, по дороге домой он встречает старшеклассницу на улице. "Я разрешу вам сделать это со мной, так что позвольте мне остаться у вас". "Даже шутить не смей о чём-то подобном". Так и началась эта история про жизнь с старшеклассницей Саю. Повседневная романтическая комедия между сбежавшей из дома старшеклассницей и 26-летним служащим.
description.pt-br: Desolado e bêbado, Yoshida, um empregado de 26 anos, deparou-se com uma estudante do ensino médio que havia saído de casa quando voltou do bar. "Ei você. JK O que diabos você está fazendo aqui? Vá para casa agora. "Tio, me deixe ficar em sua casa esta noite. Você podemos fazer "isso" se me deixar ficar." "Se você disse em tom de brincadeira, não é engraçado." "Não estou brincando. Está tudo bem por mim." "Então deixe-me dizer-lhe, não tenho interesse em pirralhas." "Hmm? Então, apenas me deixe ficar".

altTitles.ja: 幻覚少女がつきまとう話

altTitles.en: A Story About A Hallucinatory Girl Following Me Around

altTitles.vi: Cô gái trong ảo giác của tôi

altTitles.ja: 幻覚少女がつきまとう ハミタの読み切り

altTitles.ja-ro: Genkaku Shoujo ga Tsukimatou - Hamita no Yomikiri

altTitles.en: A Hallucinatory Girl Follows Me Around - Hamita Oneshots

altTitles.cs: Příběh o halucinózní holce co se za mnou slídí

description.en:
A story about being followed around by a girl who appears to be just a hallucination.

---

Note: The original web comic that was released on on Twitter and Pixiv has been compiled on Amazon into 1 ebook volume titled Genkaku Shoujo ga Tsukimatou (幻覚少女がつきまとう) "A Hallucinatory Girl Follows Me Around" and released on March 25, 2024.

* Alternate Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/116706658)

altTitles.ja: あかね噺

description.en:
Rakugo--the ultimate form of storytelling, where everything in a story is expressed with just your body and words. 
Shinta and his daughter Akane have been seduced by this wonderful form of classical Japanese entertainment. 
Having observed her father strive to pass the shin'uchi rakugo test, Akane takes her own steps into this unique world!
description.fr:
Shinta s'est perfectionné 13 ans durant afin d'atteindre le statut de Shin'uchi, le plus haut rang des rakugo-ka. Mais malgré sa très bonne performance lors de l'examen de passage, le juge de l'épreuve, l'émérite Maître Arakawa Issho, a décidé de renvoyer de l'école Arakawa l'ensemble des participants sans donner davantage d'explication ! Ainsi s'arrêta nette la carrière de Shinta, qui avait tant sacrifié pour accomplir son rêve…
Mais Akane, la fille de Shinta qui admirait son père et son rakugo plus que tout, ne compte pas en rester là !
description.th:
ที่สุดแห่งศิลปะการเล่าเรื่องที่ใช้ผู้แสดงเพียงหนึ่งคนและเรื่องเล่าเพียงหนึ่งเรื่อง --- "ราคุโกะ" นักราคุโกะ อาราคาวะ ชินตะและอาคาเนะลูกสาวของเขาต่างก็หลงเสน่ห์ของความบันเทิงอันสุดแสนจะเรียบง่ายนี้ ในวันที่ชินตะขึ้นเวทีแสดงในการสอบเลื่อนชั้นเป็นชินอุจิ อาคาเนะเองก็ได้ชมการแสดงนั้นอยู่และเส้นทางของนักราคุโกะที่อาคาเนะตัดสินใจก้าวเดินไปก็คือ---- มังงะราคุโกะขนานแท้ที่เหล่านักราคุโกะล้วนมาประชันฝีมือฟาดฟันกันได้เปิดฉากขึ้นแล้ว!

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.pt-br:
Rakugo - a forma perfeita de contar histórias, na qual tudo é expresso apenas com seu corpo e palavras. 
Shinta e sua filha, Akane, foram seduzidos por essa maravilhosa forma clássica de entretenimento. 
Observando seu pai treinar para passar no teste de Shin’uchi, Akane avança neste mundo único.

altTitles.ja: いとこのお姉ちゃんに甘えちゃう？

altTitles.en: I'll Be Spoiled by My Big Sis Cousin?

description.en: Masato Ooizumi just entered high school and he finds himself staying with a relative. Living there is his "big sister cousin" who's being way too close with him!?
description.ja: 高校進学を機に、親戚の家に居候することになった男子高校生・大泉将人。良い大学に行くために真面目に勉強したいけど、勝手に家庭教師を名乗り出た“いとこのお姉ちゃん”がセクシーすぎて、全然集中できなくて…!?
description.es-la: Una Comedia Romántica entre Primos, Un chico que apenas comenzó el Instituto y Una Onee-chan que ya va en la Universidad, esto definitivamente te encantará~

altTitles.en: Don't Mess With the Film Club!

altTitles.ja: 映像研には手を出すな！

altTitles.ja-ro: Eizouken ni wa Te o Dasu na!
Eizouken ni ha Te wo Dasu na!

description.en:
Asakusa Midori wants to create an anime, but she's too disheartened to make that first step by herself. But by pure chance, she meets Mizusaki Tsubame, an up-and-coming socialite secretly dreaming of becoming an animator. Together with Midori's money-loving best friend Kanamori Sayaka, the energetic trio slowly work towards making their "ultimate world" a reality!
___
**Additional Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Official Anime Twitter](https://twitter.com/Eizouken_anime)
- [Official Anime Website](http://eizouken-anime.com/)
